title: BUTTERICK PATTERNS B5580 Sword Holder, Bags, Pouch, Bracers, Shoulder Covers and Feather Pin, One Size Only
features: Includes pattern pieces and sewing instructions
description: SWORD HOLDER, BAGS, POUCH, BRACERS, SHOULDER COVERS AND FEATHER PIN: Package includes patterns and instructions for sword holder A, 12". Bag B, lined, 61/2" x 9". Bag C, 7" x 121/2". Pouch D, 7" x 13". Bracers E. Shoulder covers F. Feather pin G. Views A, C, D, E, F have felt backing. NOTIONS: Sword Holder A: Two 3/4" D-rings. Bag B: Eight 1/4" Two-part Grommets and 2 yds. of 1/4" Cord, Lacing or Ribbon. Bag C: 2 yds. of 1/4" - 1/2" Cord or Lacing. Pouch D: One 3/4" Magnetic Snap. Bracers E: Sixteen 3/4" D-rings. Shoulder Covers F: Twelve 3/4" D-rings and 1/4 yd. of 3/4" Elastic. Feather Pin G: 2" Decorative Jewelry Cone, Jewelry Pin, Four to Six 3" Feathers and Glue. FABRICS: View A, B, C, D, E, F: Synthetic Skin, Metallics and Leather. Also for B: Canvas and Denim. Lining B: Cotton and Cotton Blends. Contrast D: Synthetic Fur. Backing A, C, D, E, F: Felt. Unsuitable for obvious diagonals. Allow extra fabric to match plaids or stripes. Use nap yardages/layouts for pile, shaded or one-way design fabrics. *with nap. **without nap.
